Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards

Class RumourCardsPile

java.lang.Object
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.RumourCardsPile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Resettable
public final class RumourCardsPile extends Object implements Resettable

A pile of Rumour cards.

Represents a player's hand, the common pile of discarded cards or a subdivision of those.

Associates an owner (a Player) with a list of Rumour cards.

Comes with useful methods allowing to filter this pile based on a criterion (revealed cards only, cards of which the Witch? effect is currently playable only,...), and other methods allowing cards deck management (merge two decks, add a card, shuffle it, ...)

When reset(), returns this deck's content to the game's pile of all existing cards.

See Also:
  • RumourCard
  • Player::getHand()
  • Tabletop::getPile()

  • Resettable
  • reset()

  • Field Details

    • cards

      private List<RumourCard> cards
      A list of Rumour cards.

    • owner

      private Player owner
      The deck's owner, a player. The common pile of discarded cards will be the only one to have a null value for this field after instantiation of the players. Methods returning a subdivision of this pile are owner-transitive.

    • giveCard

      public void giveCard(RumourCard rc, RumourCardsPile destination)
      Gives a Rumour card of this deck to another deck. If the given card is contained in this deck, adds it to the given deck, then removes it from this deck.
      Parameters:
      rc - The Rumour card to be transfered to another deck.
      destination - The deck to which a Rumour card is transfered.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Returns this deck's content to the game's pile of all existing cards.

      Call this method only on players' decks and on the common pile of discarded cards at the end of a Round.

      Specified by:
      reset in interface Resettable

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Randomly shuffles the Rumour cards contained in this deck. Called before cards' distribution.
      See Also:
      • Round
      • Collections.shuffle(List)

    • equals

      public boolean equals(RumourCardsPile rcp)
      Asserts whether a given deck equals this one or not.
      Parameters:
      rcp - The pile of Rumour cards to be compared with this one.
      Returns:
      true only if both decks contain the same cards, false otherwise.

      Requests the view to display the content of this deck, through a DisplayMediator.
      Parameters:
